text: Renée Lynn Fleming (born February 14, 1959) is an American opera singer and soprano. Fleming is known for having a full lyric soprano voice.Tommasini, Anthony: "For a Wary Soprano, Slow and Steady Wins the Race", The New York Times, September 14, 1997 She has sung chansons, jazz and indie rock. Her best known roles include Countess Almaviva in Mozart's Le nozze di Figaro, Desdemona in Verdi's Otello, Violetta in Verdi's La traviata, the title role in Dvořák's Rusalka, the title role in Massenet's Manon, the title role in Massenet's Thaïs, the title role in Richard Strauss's Arabella, the Marschallin in Der Rosenkavalier, and the Countess in Capriccio. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American opera singers Category:American jazz singers Category:American sopranos Category:Singers from Pennsylvania
title: Renée Fleming
